p: In Egypt the distribution of susceptible hosts and competent vectors of RVFV overlap in most areas and that results in that the areas at risk of RVFV transmission is restricted to the wet areas surrounding the Nile River and its delta. However, within the areas where RVFV transmission by vectors was estimated as possible, there are significant differences in the risk ( Fig 8). The areas identified with the highest risk are the Cairo area and to its north ( Fig 8-1), Faiyum and Beni Suef area ( Fig 8-2), Asyut, Sohag and Qena area ( Fig 8-3), and Luxor area ( Fig 8-4).
